item.title: Graduate Projects
item.description:
Graduate Projects Available for Winter 2022:

  • Using Machine Learning for Rare Disease Detection. This project will be co-supervised by Dr. Matthew Henderson (Laboratory Head of Biochemistry and Point of Care Screening) from Newborn Screening Ontario (NSO).
  • Predicting 30-day mortality using patients data. This project requires mandatory training for accessing the data.
  • Federated learning
  • Multi-Task Active Learning
  • Artificial Immune Systems
  • Build a Python package for a specific problem
  • Time evolving malware attacks
  • Feature selection techniques
  • Multi-label Imbalance Learning

Notes:

  • Several of above projects may have different applications and some may be evaluated in a cybersecurity context if you are interested;
  • for more details, please send me an email.
